text: {{Infobox settlement | name = | native_name = | native_name_lang = | settlement_type = Region | image_skyline = Utcubamba amazonas peru.jpg | image_alt = | image_caption = Utkupampa valley, Amazonas Region | image_flag = Amazonas_bandera.png | flag_alt = | image_seal = Escudo amazonasregion.png | seal_alt = | image_shield = | shield_alt = | nickname = | motto = | image_map = Peru - Amazonas Department (locator map).svg | map_alt = | map_caption = Location of the Amazonas Region in Peru | pushpin_map = | pushpin_label_position = | pushpin_map_alt = | pushpin_map_caption = | coordinates = | coor_pinpoint = | coordinates_footnotes = | subdivision_type = Country | subdivision_name = Peru | subdivision_type1 = Subdivisions | subdivision_name1 = 7 provinces and 83 districts | subdivision_type2 = | subdivision_name2 = | subdivision_type3 = | subdivision_name3 = | established_title = | established_date = | founder = | seat_type = Capital | seat = Chachapoyas | government_footnotes = | leader_party = | leader_title = Governor | leader_name = Oscar Altamirano (2019–2022) | unit_pref = Metric | area_footnotes = | area_total_km2 = 39249.13 | area_land_km2 = | area_water_km2 = | area_water_percent = | area_note = | elevation_footnotes = (Capital) | elevation_m = 2334 | elevation_max_m = | elevation_min_m = | population_footnotes = | population_total = 379384 | population_as_of = 2017 | population_density_km2 = auto | population_demonym = | population_note = | timezone1 = | utc_offset1 = | timezone1_DST = | utc_offset1_DST = | postal_code_type = UBIGEO | postal_code = 01 | area_code_type = Dialing code | area_code = 041 | iso_code = PE-AMA | website = www.regionamazonas.gob.pe | footnotes = | blank_name_sec1 = Principal resources | blank_info_sec1 = Coffee, rice, fruits, wood and cebu cattle. | blank2_name_sec1 = | blank2_info_sec1 = | blank3_name_sec1 = | blank3_info_sec1 = }} The Region of Amazonas is a region of Peru. It is in the northwest part of the country. Its capital is the city of Chachapoyas. ==Geography== The Amazonas Region has a lot of rainforests and mountain ranges. The rainforest zone covers 72.93% of the area, and it goes to the north, up to the border with Ecuador. It does this in the summits of the Cordillera del Cóndor. The mountain range zone is in the southern provinces of the Amazonas Region. It makes up 27.07% of the region's land. ==People== Aguaruna and Huambisa people live in the region. === Languages === The 2007 Peru Census says that the language learnt first by most of the people was Spanish (84.90%).
